subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are set to retire Andy Pettitte’s No. 46 jersey and honor him with a plaque in Yankee Stadium’s Monument Park in a ceremony on Aug. 23.
snippet: The Yankees are set to retire Andy Pettitte’s No. 46 jersey and honor him with a plaque in Yankee Stadium’s Monument Park in a ceremony on Aug. 23.
